description: Different person replies with partial info - should extract data but NOT update Leasing Contact

messages.content: Hi Jonathan, I'm interested in 2058 Gordon Hwy in Augusta. Can you provide the property specifications?

Hey yeah I can help ya on this property.

The space is 10,000 SF with $6.50/SF NNN asking rent.

Thanks,
Baylor Harrison

notes: CRITICAL: Even though 'Baylor Harrison' signed the email, Leasing Contact must remain 'Jonathan Aceves'
